SEARCH
Package com.ttc.fitPT.ptSchedule.service

Class AdminService

java.lang.Object
com.ttc.fitPT.ptSchedule.service.AdminService
@Service public class AdminService extends Object
AdminService provides functionality to manage users, therapists, and certifications.

  • Method Details

    • getAllUsers

      public List<User> getAllUsers(String sortBy, String sortOrder, String personType)
      Retrieves a list of all users with basic information.
      Parameters:
      sortBy - the field to sort by (e.g., LAST_NAME).
      sortOrder - the sorting order (e.g., ASC or DESC).
      personType - the type of person to filter by (optional).
      Returns:
      a list of users.

    • getTherapistInfo

      public String getTherapistInfo(int therapistId)
      Retrieves detailed therapist information by therapist ID.
      Parameters:
      therapistId - the ID of the therapist.
      Returns:
      a string containing the therapist's information.

    • getCertificationInfo

      public String getCertificationInfo(String certAbbreviation)
      Retrieves certification information by its abbreviation.
      Parameters:
      certAbbreviation - the abbreviation of the certification.
      Returns:
      a string containing certification details.

    • deleteUser

      public void deleteUser(int personId)
      Deletes a user by their ID.
      Parameters:
      personId - the ID of the user to be deleted.

    • editUser

      public void editUser(int personId, String firstName, String lastName, String uName, String pWord, String email, String phone)
      Updates user information.
      Parameters:
      personId - the ID of the user.
      firstName - the new first name (optional).
      lastName - the new last name (optional).
      uName - the new username (optional).
      pWord - the new password (optional).
      email - the new email address (optional).
      phone - the new phone number (optional).

    • addUser

      public void addUser(String firstName, String lastName, String personType, String email, String phone)
      Adds a new user to the system.
      Parameters:
      firstName - the user's first name.
      lastName - the user's last name.
      personType - the type of user (e.g., Therapist, Scheduler, Admin).
      email - the user's email address.
      phone - the user's phone number.

    • addTherapistReview

      Adds a review rating for a therapist.
      Parameters:
      therapistId - the ID of the therapist.
      rating - the rating to be added.

    • getTherapistRatings

    • getTherapistCertifications

      public List<String> getTherapistCertifications(int therapistId) throws Exception
      Retrieves certifications for a specific therapist.
      Parameters:
      therapistId - the ID of the therapist.
      Returns:
      a list of certification strings.
      Throws:
      Exception - if there is an error retrieving certifications.

    • addSystemCertification

      public void addSystemCertification(String abbreviation, String description, String therapyType)
      Adds a new certification to the system.
      Parameters:
      abbreviation - the abbreviation of the certification.
      description - the description of the certification.
      therapyType - the therapy type associated with the certification.

    • deleteSystemCertification

      public void deleteSystemCertification(String abbreviation)
      Deletes a certification from the system.
      Parameters:
      abbreviation - the abbreviation of the certification to be deleted.
